templates.title: Wordpress Prod
templates.description: Wordpress prod setup with a MySQL database
templates.note: Deploys a Wordpress instance connected to a MySQL database.

env.name: PROJECT_SHORT_NAME
env.label: Short name
env.description: Project short name, example Project 1 -> project1 (use only lowercase, no special characters)

env.name: MYSQL_DATABASE_NAME
env.label: Database name
env.description: Database name used by the WordPress.
